apps.name: Undertale
apps.subtitle: Undertale - IOS Port
apps.description:
Welcome to UNDERTALE. In this RPG, you control a human who falls underground into the world of monsters.
Now you must find your way out... or stay trapped forever.
((Healthy Dog's Warning: Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition.))
Status: ✅
apps.localizedDescription:
Welcome to UNDERTALE. In this RPG, you control a human who falls underground into the world of monsters.
Now you must find your way out... or stay trapped forever.
((Healthy Dog's Warning: Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition.))
Status: ✅
apps.title: Undertale

apps.name: Undertale Yellow
apps.subtitle: Undertale Yellow - IOS Port
apps.description:
Welcome to UNDERTALE YELLOW, a fan-made prequel to the hit RPG, 'UNDERTALE'.
When a child named Clover sets out on a mission, they find themself deep within the Underground.
In this foreign land, monsters lurk around every corner, but are they friend or foe?
Status: ✅
apps.localizedDescription:
Welcome to UNDERTALE YELLOW, a fan-made prequel to the hit RPG, 'UNDERTALE'.

In this foreign land, monsters lurk around every corner, but are they friend or foe?
Status: ✅
apps.title: Undertale Yellow

apps.name: Undertale Red & Yellow
apps.subtitle: Undertale Red & Yellow - IOS Port
apps.description:
Have you played Undertale Yellow? After completing it, did you think: Man, I really wanna replay Undertale now, but I've already played it so many times...
No?
WELL TOO BAD! 
Introducing: Undertale Red & Yellow! 
An Undertale mod designed to scratch that Undertale Yellow itch!
 Status: ✅
apps.localizedDescription:
Have you played Undertale Yellow? After completing it, did you think: Man, I really wanna replay Undertale now, but I've already played it so many times...
No?
WELL TOO BAD! 
Introducing: Undertale Red & Yellow! 
An Undertale mod designed to scratch that Undertale Yellow itch!
Status: ✅
apps.title: Undertale Red & Yellow

apps.name: Undertale Bits & Pieces
apps.subtitle: Undertale Bits & Pieces - IOS Port
apps.description:
Undertale: Bits and Pieces was an unofficial mod of Toby Fox's Undertale™, made by Team BnP, that reimagined the game. Due to unexpected complications surrounding the main lead, the project has been abandoned. A new project will be taking its place, free of their influence. We've decided to archive this page, and will be releasing what we had of the anticipated Suzy Update, in the broken buggy state it was left at. If you wish to install any of the releases, read this guide on how to do so.
Status: ✅
apps.localizedDescription:
Undertale: Bits and Pieces was an unofficial mod of Toby Fox's Undertale™, made by Team BnP, that reimagined the game. Due to unexpected complications surrounding the main lead, the project has been abandoned. A new project will be taking its place, free of their influence. We've decided to archive this page, and will be releasing what we had of the anticipated Suzy Update, in the broken buggy state it was left at. If you wish to install any of the releases, read this guide on how to do so.
Status: ✅
apps.title: Undertale Bits & Pieces
